member.summary: Represents a framework-level set of properties, events, and methods for .NET MAUI elements.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this FrameworkElement is enabled in the user interface.

member.summary: Gets the color which will fill the background of a FrameworkElement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.Frame
member.summary: Gets the bounds of the FrameworkElement.

member.summary: Gets the current rendered width of this FrameworkElement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.Height
member.summary: Gets the current rendered height of this FrameworkElement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.Handler
member.summary: Gets or sets the View Handler of the FrameworkElement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.Parent
member.summary: Gets the Parent of the Element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.Arrange(Microsoft.Maui.Rectangle)
member.summary: Positions child elements and determines a size for an Element.
member.param: The size that the parent computes for the child element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.Measure(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the size of an FrameworkElement.
member.param: The width that a parent element can allocate a child element.
The height that a parent element can allocate a child element.
member.returns: Return the rendered Size for this element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.DesiredSize
member.summary: Gets the current rendered Size of this FrameworkElement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.IsMeasureValid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current size returned by layout measure is valid.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.IsArrangeValid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the computed size and position of child elements in this element's layout are valid.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.InvalidateMeasure
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the computed size and position of child elements in this element's layout are valid.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.IFrameworkElement.InvalidateArrange
member.summary: Method that is called to invalidate the layout of this FrameworkElement.

member.summary: Represents a View that show progress as a horizontal bar that is filled to a percentage represented by a float value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Maui.IProgress.Progress
member.summary: Is a value that represents the current progress as a value from 0 to 1. Progress values less than 0 will be clamped to 0, values greater than 1 will be clamped to 1.
